message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $13,000. Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're willing to pay $13,000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though - I can do $14,200. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $14,200 is still a little high for me. I'm really keen on this product, but my budget maxes out at $13,500.  Let's meet in the middle at that price and seal the deal.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm not willing to go as low as $13,500, but I can meet you halfway between $14,200 and $13,500. I'll do $13,800. That's the best I can do.
